computer-name.description: name of the computer under analysis

fDenyTSConnections:.description: Specifies whether remote connections are enabled or disabled on the system.

last-write-time.description: Date and time when the key was last updated.

shutdown-time.description: Date and time when the system was shutdown.

timezone-bias.description: Offset in minutes from UTC. Offset added to the local time to get a UTC value.

timezone-daylight-bias.description: value in minutes to be added to the value of timezone-bias to generate the bias used during daylight time.

timezone-daylight-name.description: Timezone name used during daylight saving months.

timezone-last-write-time.description: Date and time when the timezone key was last updated.

timezone-standard-bias.description: value in minutes to be added to the value of timezone-bias to generate the bias used during standard time.

timezone-standard-date.description: Standard date - non daylight saving months

timezone-standard-name.description: Timezone standard name used during non-daylight saving months.

description: Regripper Object template designed to present general system properties extracted from the system-hive.
name: regripper-system-hive-general-configuration
